inmydata agents API reference
=============================

The inmydata agents Python Library enables you to build AI agents that can rapidly access data from the inmydata platform. 
Documentation, quickstarts, and examples `can be found here <https://developer.inmydata.com>`__

To install::

    pip install inmydata
